Instruction: In a large bowl, combine diced cooked chicken breast, diced celery, and white grapes.
In a small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, Greek yogurt, Dijon mustard, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the chicken salad mixture and toss until well combined.
Refrigerate the salad for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a side dish or in sandwiches.
